name: Bamboo Flute
description: This bamboo flute is crafted from high-quality bamboo, providing a rich and mellow tone. It's perfect for classical and folk music performances. Includes a protective case.

name: Tabla
description: A traditional tabla set featuring high-quality wooden construction and goatskin heads. It offers a crisp and resonant sound, ideal for classical Indian music. Includes a tuning hammer and cushions.

name: Harmonium
description: This harmonium is made with precision craftsmanship, featuring a teakwood body and brass reeds for a full, resonant sound. It is suitable for both beginners and professional musicians. Includes a padded carrying case.

name: Sitar
description: A beautifully crafted sitar with a seasoned teak body and intricate inlay work. It produces a rich, deep sound, perfect for classical Indian music. Comes with a sturdy case and extra strings.

name: Dholak
description: This dholak features a hardwood body and natural leather heads, offering a versatile range of tones. It is ideal for folk and traditional music. Includes a tuning wrench and protective cover.
